title: Account transfer
body:
Good day, Riot.

I am looking to transfer servers from OCE to NA, but on the account page, (where I can buy the servers I want to change into) there's only the name change available. Is there a special way to transfer servers?

Hoping for a response soon. Thanks.

replies.body:
Transfers are currently disabled and will be disabled until November 21. You can read more about this downtime here:

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/eylRc8AL-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st
I am having the same problem.
